task.title: How to Save Files from the Adobe Creative Cloud
task.shortdesc: The Adobe Creative Cloud has a lot of excellent software available to use. If you are unsure of how to use a program, be sure to visit the Adobe Creative Cloud website for their helpful tutorials.

context.p: This manual will show you how to login to the system and save your work.

step.cmd: Login to the Creative Cloud using the same login information that you did to get on the computer.
Open whichever applications you'd like to use and conduct whatever designing you need on the application.
When you have finished or made sufficient progress on your project, upload it to an online drive or a flash drive and save it to your Cloud.
Save a file to your Cloud by clicking "file" and then "save as Cloud file"

taskbody.postreq:
Remember that any file left on the desktop will be deleted. It is best to save your files both in the Cloud and on your own drive.
Even if you are not on a Virginia Tech computer, you can access your Guest Creative Cloud account for an extra week from the last day of your AirClassroom Lease.
